name: BOSSES FOREVER 2.BRO
storyline:
Climb the infinite tower with your bestest bro as you fight endless bosses who evolve based on every action you make. 
 
BOSSES FOREVER 2.BRO is the co-op update to the original BOSSES FOREVER. Now you and your buddy can face off against menacing bosses that learn how to fight you as you play. With every action determining the boss' power, attacks, and techniques, no two runs in BOSSES FOREVER 2.BRO will be the same.
summary: Team up with your bestest bro to climb up the tower fighting bosses forever. Each boss learns based on how you move, attack, and perform. The better you are,the harder it gets. How many bosses will you defeat, bro?
